item.title: ASP.NET Core: A powerful API Design with OData, EF and SQLKata
item.description: Rather than reinventing the wheel, you may need a fast and reliable solution in a short time span. In this case, your framework should be able to support all your requirements. ASP.NET Core is doing that very well.
